name: Caeda's Quest
description: Caeda has heard a rumor that a powerful new skill can be learned at the Snake Hole Lounge.

name: Troy's Quest
description: There may be remnants of an healing tonic at the Snake Hole.  Send Troy and friends to investigate.

name: Beorn's Quest
description: One of Beorn's retired guard buddies has some information.  Seek them out at the Snake Hole.

name: Neve's Quest
description: Neve is looking for answers about her past.  Maybe the Snake Hole is a good place to start?

name: Caeda's Other Quest
description: Caeda is in need of information, and the manager at Whole Holes is just the person to talk to.

name: Cedric's Quest
description: Cedric is hungry.  Send him to Whole Holes to find a nutrious snack fit for an adventurer.

name: Zoe's Quest
description: Zoe's childhood home is 11454 Pruder Street.   She's feeling nostalgic, and would like some company.

name: Titus's Quest
description: Titus once struck a shady deal with someone living on Pruder Street, and now it's time to collect.

name: Alok's Quest
description: Burrito Bonanza is a well-known meeting spot for criminal nobility.  Alok should visit.

name: Grim's Quest
description: Grim has heard of a special artifact hidden deep in the Artifact Mansion, and he desperately needs to find it.

name: Revere's Quest
description: Revere is always looking for new treasures to plunder, and the Ancient Tomb has potential.

name: Grogmar's Quest
description: Sir Randolph Doogleberry holds the key to Grogmar's future.  They should meet.

name: Alok's Other Quest
description: They say one must look inward to find true power.  Alok wants to look inside the Philosophical Cave.

name: Lambug's Quest
description: Lambug is interested in visiting Mom's Basement.  Perhaps something legendary awaits.

name: Cedric's Other Quest
description: Cedric is hungry again.  Hopefully the ice cream machine isn't broken at the Arch.

name: Neve's Other Quest
description: Neve would like to get a new perspective.  She would like to take an elevator to the top of the Arch.

name: Troy's Other Quest
description: Newly reopened, the Community College is offering courses.  Troy could learn a lot there.

name: Beorn's Other Quest
description: An odd distress call has been reported at the Crank Factory.  Beorn should investigate.

name: Grim's Other Quest
description: Grim is on a mission for information.  The Steam Pipe may have some boxes he can rummage through.

name: Titus's Other Quest
description: The Golden Catue is home to some of the most unseemly characters in the realm.  Titus will fit in just fine.

name: Lambug's Other Quest
description: The Sheriff of Maple Harbor has issued an urgent request for Lambug's aid.

name: Revere's Other Quest
description: The nomads at the Rapid Chi Orchard wish to hire Revere to help them with their rodent problem.  Discreetly.

name: Grogmar's Other Quest
description: Gromgar heard of an opossum breaking free at the Wildlife Sanctuary.  If they can catch it, a reward is surely in store.

name: Zoe's Other Quest
description: Those living near the Hive would like the infestation dealt with swiftly.  Send Zoe to violenty burn the atrocity.
